anim_delay_tooltip: Delay in ms before starting the needle animation
animate_duration_tooltip: Duration in ms for the needle animation
arc_padding_title: The distance between the elements in the arc (default 0.05)
aspect_ratio_tooltip: Gauge aspect ratio, At padding 0 easy to create battery types -> D = 0.56, C = 0.52, AA = 0.28, AAA = 0.23, AAAA = 0.19 , default C battery
inner_radius_tooltip: The radius of the inner circle. A value of 0.9 equals 90% of the radius of the outer circle.
level_stop_opacity_tooltip: Value from 0 to 1, 0 is transparent, 1 is opaque
level_threshold_tooltip: Absolute value of the level threshold. First level is 0, last is MAX
margin_in_percent_tooltip: Margin for the chart inside the containing SVG element (default 0.05)
margin_tooltip: The size of the gap between the outer circle and wave circle as a percentage of the radius of the outer circle. A value of 0.025 equals 2.5% of the radius of the outer circle.
name: Name
no_of_cells_tooltip: More than 1, will create cell battery
outer_radius_tooltip: The radius of the outer circle. A value of 1 equals 100% of the radius of the outer circle.
rise_animation_time_tooltip: The amount of time in milliseconds for the wave to rise from 0 to it's final height.
text_size_tooltip: The relative height of the text to display in the wave circle. A value of 1 equals 50% of the radius of the outer circle.
wave_amplitude_tooltip: The wave height as a percentage of the radius of the wave circle.
wave_animation_time_tooltip: The amount of time in milliseconds for a full wave to enter the wave circle.
wave_frequency_tooltip: The number of full waves per width of the wave circle.
